summary: The reviewer suggests using the metro rather than a taxi to reach due to frequent traffic jams. They highly recommend the Fastpass system for rides, particularly enjoying Tron and Pirates. While the food inside the park is standard, they recommend trying better options in Disney town, particularly Xin Wang.

review: Much better than Hong Kong Disneyland, much bigger. The best is the Tron ride. It was very exciting as I sat in a motorcycle riding position that brought my body and face forward, quite scary. Overall it was a good time with the kids. The light show in the evening was also nice. Then we had a nice dinner in the Cheesecake Factory!
summary: The reviewer had a positive experience, finding it superior to Hong Kong Disneyland due to its larger size. The Tron ride was a highlight, offering an exciting and slightly scary motorcycle riding simulation. The reviewer also enjoyed time with the kids, an evening light show, and a pleasing dinner at the Cheesecake Factory.

review: We visited Disneyland during winter. Itâ€™s not so crowded in which you can entered all rides if you plan well. For the night show, we have waited to see the show and firework at 8pm, unfortunately, there is no firework on that night due to bad air pollution but understandable reason though. So if you would like to see the firework, maybe you need to take air pollution as consideration before as well.
summary: The review describes a satisfactory visit to Disneyland during winter, when it was not very crowded and allowed them to enjoy all the rides with proper planning. However, they were disappointed as they couldn't see the fireworks during the night show at 8pm due to air pollution. They suggest that others planning to watch the fireworks should consider the likely air quality.

review: If you like Disney you will not be disappointed. This park is pretty awesome with lots of great attractions and, of course, the largest castle. The Enchanted Storybook Castle is huge and looms over 197 feet tall over the park. Everything in China is busy and Disney is no exception so come prepared and get fast pass.
summary: The reviewer highly recommends the park for Disney fans as it boasts numerous attractive features, including the tremendously large Enchanted Storybook Castle. However, they also note that, similar to its surroundings in China, the park can get very busy, hence they suggest coming prepared and obtaining a fast pass.

summary: The reviewer suggests arriving early to Shanghai Disney due to long entrance queues. You can bring your own food and drink into the park, which they found to be a major plus. They recommend downloading the Shanghai Disney app for fast pass access to rides like 7 Dwarfs, Soaring Horizon, and Tron. They highlight the opening ceremony at the castle as a must-see. For dinner, takeaway food is suggested, and they recommend returning to the castle for the closing ceremony and fireworks around 6.30pm. They emphasize that covering the entire park in one day is difficult, especially with kids. review: stunning place to enjoy especially if the weather is good so much to do and check the Soar show is amazing
summary: The reviewer praises the location as being particularly enjoyable in good weather, offering many activities. They specifically recommend the Soar show as an amazing experience.

review: Definitely a must visit when youâ€™re in Shanghai!! Worth every penny. The attractions never fail to amaze me and almost all the rides come with an amazing and magical experiences. I am definitely in awe and would highly recommend this place! Do also stay till 8pm to watch the fireworks which comes with a live 3D experience of Disney characters outside the iconic castle. However, please avoid coming on a weekend as it can get overly crowded.
summary: The user highly recommends the visit to this attraction in Shanghai, stating that it's worth the cost. The user enjoyed the amazing and magical experiences offered by the rides. They also suggested watching the 3D fireworks show featuring Disney characters at 8pm outside the iconic castle. They noted, though, that weekends can be overly crowded, so it's better to visit on a weekday.

review: We have always like theme parks. This park is big. We stayed at Disneyland hotel and had early access, which is great because we manage to go on a few rides without queue and also manage to book fastpasses without much effort (although we did need to figure out how to book for a while but the app is friendly enough, just that wifi connection in china is a pain).My older child enjoyed herself very much. My younger one (3yo) tired easily, so it is a good thing we can pop back and forth the hotel.Great firework at the end.
summary: The reviewer enjoyed their visit to the theme park, particularly benefiting from staying at the Disneyland hotel, which allowed for early access and easier booking of fastpasses. The park's size and the ease of use of the park's app were also appreciated, although there were issues with the wifi connection in China. Their older child loved the park, while their younger child tired easily; the ability to easily return to the hotel was deemed a positive. The firework display at the end was highly appreciated.

review: To all like me, VISIT THIS PLACE and you will to, love the Tron roller coaster! Then, rate an excellent like me!!!
summary: The reviewer highly recommends visiting this place, especially for the Tron roller coaster, which they loved. They rate the place as excellent.

review: Spent the whole day at Shanghai Disneyland.  easy to get there by trains and cheap. We spent all day there, what a blast
summary: The reviewer had a fantastic day at Shanghai Disneyland, finding it easily accessible by train and inexpensive. They spent the whole day there and thoroughly enjoyed it.
